titleStmt.title: Meditations on the holy sacrament of the Lords last Supper Written many yeares since by Edvvard Reynolds then fellow of Merton College in Oxford.
titleStmt.author: Reynolds, Edward, 1599-1676.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Felix Kyngston for Robert Bostock, and are to be sould at his shop in S. Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Kings Head,

notesStmt.note: The leaf after first p. 94 and the leaf after first p. 142 are cancelled.
Running title reads: Meditations on the Lords last Supper.
A variant (STC 20929a) has John Maynard as publisher in imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in S. Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Kings Head
